definition: to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)
to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity

sentences.english: The act expressly provides for injunctive relief.
sentences.chinese: 刑事救济规定对受害人进行充分补偿。

sentences.english: When late rend away victim Li Cheng wait a student the cellular phone is three and the lump is 47 dollars.
sentences.chinese: 当晚抢走受害人李成等学生手机三部及现金47元。

sentences.english: The victim beefed and went to the police.
sentences.chinese: 受害人去向警方告发了。

sentences.english: Victim is Caucasian female, approximately twenty-five years old.
sentences.chinese: 受害人是个白种人女性，大概在二十五岁。

sentences.english: How to safeguard the behoof of the victim becomes the topic that people concern very much .
sentences.chinese: 如何保护受害人的利益，成为人们十分关心的话题。

sentences.english: This is the very knife which he used to murder the victim.
sentences.chinese: 他就是用这把刀谋杀了受害人。

sentences.english: The victim can be any gender. The harasser can be any gender.
sentences.chinese: 性骚扰者和受害人并非仅限于某单一性别。

sentences.english: The victim, identified by his surname Lu, was a freshman in Sichuan Normal University.
sentences.chinese: 这位受害人姓卢，是四川师范大学的一名大一新生。

sentences.english: Police are carrying out an analysis of the dirt on the victim; s botts .
sentences.chinese: 警察在对受害人鞋上的泥土进行化验分析。

sentences.english: The compensations for the injuries seldom yield complete satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 伤害赔偿很少使受害人称心如意。

sentences.english: The the police immediately suspect and the victim to by survey.
sentences.chinese: 该所民警立即将嫌疑人和受害人带至所内调查。

sentences.english: We would like to take this opportunity to convey our heartfelt condolences to the families of the victims.
sentences.chinese: 我们谨此向受害人家属表达我们衷心的慰唁。

sentences.english: To free your mind you have to transcend the judge and the victim.
sentences.chinese: 要使心灵得到解脱，必须超越法官和受害人。

sentences.english: The blackmailer milked his victims of huge amounts of money.
sentences.chinese: 敲诈者从受害人身上榨取了大量金钱。

sentences.english: The victim's daughter was sentenced to 17 years behind bars.
sentences.chinese: 受害人的女儿被判17年有期徒刑。

sentences.english: Victims in the courtroom clapped as the term was read out.
sentences.chinese: 当入狱期限被读出时，法庭中的受害人鼓起掌来。

definition: victim (of a criminal)/party involved (in a dispute etc)/main instigator
to report a case to the authorities
to investigate a crime on the spot/to occur (of a crime)/to be discovered (of a crime)
to cause an accident/to be responsible for an incident/to provoke a disturbance
